'''''Solitary Report''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. It is granted when the player obtains the {{Item|"Special Report"}} from [[Chronie]] after completing the {{Quest|Fontaine Research Institute Chronicles}}.
